Articles.Content:
I recall reading somewhere a long time ago that there was a mod to add variety to the logs when doing science/reports. For example, instead of seeing the same "you record your assessment of the situation" for all your EVA reports in space, you get different messages like "Hey I can see my house from up here". 

I can't find any trace of this type of mod, nor can I remember even what it was called to do a decent search for it. Does anyone know what I'm talking about or where I can find it?

There're few others, not sure how up to date they are. Cacteye Telescope mod... can't rememeber the other other ones.

I have a gravioli core part with some science activity, but might now be your cup of tea if you are looking for more conventional game play science.

Edited May 14, 2016 by nli2work

I think you're looking for:

It adds new text when you run experiments.
SteveD80, that's exactly what I was looking for! Thanks a lot!
